languages-and-frameworks.description: Here we've placed development languages, development frameworks, which are useful for implementing custom software of all kinds.

methods-and-patterns.description: Patterns are very important. Many of them last much longer than tools or frameworks. Therefore, this category determines how we develop software.

platforms-and-operations.description: Here we include infrastructure platforms and services. We also use this category to communicate news about DB1 services that we want all DB1 teams to be aware of.

tools.description: Here we put different software tools - from small helpers to bigger software projects.
